content: hey crafters I'm back with part two of the shipwreck vid today we're going to
finish up the pieces we assemble them last time so if you didn't see the first
part make sure you watch that first this in part two we're going to finish them
up with detailing and I'll show what they look like washed up on the beach so
let's go to the table and start finishing those up crafting yeah so
today we're finishing up our shipwreck pieces I'm gonna use some black and a
dark brown and you could really use any dark brown so I get those in my palette
which is an old plastic container those work great for pallets I'm just covering
each with the dark brown in the black I'm kind of doing a mix on the fly just
to keep it like a dark a really dark brown but I do want that Brown to show
through this is a rather large piece I got my mast and sail I'm covering the
whole thing with this even the sail because I want to use that to get the
shading in the folds of the sails you have to be careful with this make sure
you get all the folds in the sails as the spray paint the black spray paint
likely won't cover the whole thing so now I'm using a grey and a spiced
brown just a light gray and I'm going to start highlighting that with some spiced
Brown just dragging the brush over I'm not filling the whole thing in with a
spiced Brown see a little better there see I'm dragging it on the surface that
gives it a more woody look there you go do the same thing to the math I really
just need to hit the berries of the master of the wood I'm not really going
to hit the sail and the last part I'm use a little bit of gray on it and this
will give some age to the wood so that makes those details pop out
really nice and the mast also now for the mess I'm going to use a ivory and a
light and a white actually so I'm paying the sale with the ivory and that's kind
of an off-white just painting the whole thing not feeling it totally in and then
I'm gonna use some white on top of that ready for the next step now I've let it
dry and it's ready for I want to do the ropes because I painted over the ropes
when I did the mass so I'm gonna use the dark brown and go back over the ropes
that are embedded into the sail there you see me pulling it along with a thin
brush that'll pull those out of the white so they don't get lost now I'm
just going to use a tan or camel for the rope color and I'll just drag the small
brush along the rope and that Brown that I I painted on there will have a nice
shading to that rope and then I'll just paint the rope attached to the mast and
it's all good to go the roping looks great
one last thing that the mass will need some more white and I'm gonna use do
some highlights on it so I'm not doing the whole thing I'm just picking out
some of the raised areas and this will give it some more definition it's all
about showing those details you crafted and this is a good way to do that all
right now I want to do a little bit of seaweed on the pieces the wrecked pieces
so I mean is a darker green in the lighter green it really doesn't matter
which you use you could even use a darker green and put white on it and
lighten it up now I'm just taking the paint right out of the camps here and
just kind of stippling it on the piece okay the dark and then the light on top
of that and then we'll drive a little darker when it's finished here's a nice
sandy beach the swaying palm trees the water rolling in be great except for one
thing that your shipwrecked on the island so here's our shipwreck pieces
and our main piece looks really good and give some great appearance to the
shipwreck and we got some wood piles that we did in our earlier video here's
a friend of the ship we did and that looks really really cool positive on the
beach our main mast and another nice piece so there we go there's our ship
wrecked pieces for the for the game and I spread these out during the game so
they weren't all together like this oh man that was a heck of a bender last
night where is Roderick at now Oh what where's Mike where's my cabin wasn't I
partying on the ship oh geez oh this isn't good
